## NotRepresentableError class

Signals that the given text cannot be fully encoded in the chosen [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NotRepresentableError extends Error 
```
